import { useState } from 'react'; import { Droplet, Activity, Settings, List, BarChart2 } from 'lucide-react'; import './WaterMonitor.css'; export default function WaterMonitorWebsite() { const [devices, setDevices] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Sensor A1', location: 'Main Tank', status: 'Online', lastReading: '7.2 pH' }, { id: 2, name: 'Sensor B2', location: 'Filtration System', status: 'Online', lastReading: '6.8 pH' }, { id: 3, name: 'Flow Meter C3', location: 'Inlet Pipe', status: 'Offline', lastReading: '2.3 L/min' }, { id: 4, name: 'Sensor D4', location: 'Treatment Area', status: 'Online', lastReading: '6.9 pH' } ]); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('devices'); const toggleDeviceStatus = (id) => { setDevices(devices.map(device => { if (device.id === id) { const newStatus = device.status === 'Online' ? 'Offline' : 'Online'; return { ...device, status: newStatus }; } return device; })); }; const calibrateDevice = (id) => { alert(`Calibrating Device ${id}. Please wait...`); }; return (
